meanings.definition: A happening or occurrence by chance.
meanings.sent1: The happenchances of meeting an old friend at the store were slim.
meanings.sent2: The happenchances of winning the lottery are very low.
meanings.sent3: It was a happenchance to find a four-leaf clover in the park.
meanings.sent4: The happenchance of a shooting star streaking across the sky amazed us.
meanings.sent5: The happenchance of a rainbow appearing after the rain brought joy to everyone.

meanings.sent1: The unexpected job offer was a happenchance for her.
meanings.sent2: Winning the raffle was a happenchance that made his day.
meanings.sent3: Finding money in an old jacket was a happenchance stroke of luck.
meanings.sent4: The happenchance of a sunny day on their wedding was a blessing.
meanings.sent5: The happenchance of meeting a celebrity at the cafe was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To occur by chance or accident.
meanings.sent1: It happenchances that we bump into each other at the park.
meanings.sent2: The meeting with the CEO happenchances tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: She happenchances to find her lost keys under the sofa.
meanings.sent4: The idea happenchances to pop into his mind during the shower.
meanings.sent5: The solution happenchances to appear when least expected.
